titles.title: SOIL Act of 2022
Security and Oversight for International Landholdings Act of 2022
SOIL Act of 2022
A bill to increase oversight of foreign direct investment in agricultural land in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Security and Oversight for International Landholdings Act of 2022 or the SOIL Act of 2022
This bill expands provisions related to foreign investment in certain agricultural land transactions. For example, the bill requires the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States to review an investment that could result in certain foreign control of U.S. agricultural land.
